definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: In this note, a necessary and sufficient condition of diagonalization for square matrix is considering.
sentences.chinese: 方陣是否可以對角化，是矩陣的一條很重要的性質。

sentences.english: On one continent, thousands of people line in square matrix, rushing ahead to kill.
sentences.chinese: 在一塊大陸上，上萬的人排成方陣，彼此衝殺。

sentences.english: Solar arrays are set up on the regolith that covers the Moon’s surface.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能電池方陣覆蓋着月球表土。

sentences.english: The numerous students with pink and blue raincoats made the view very magnificent.
sentences.chinese: 中小學生方陣裏大家披着粉色和藍色的雨衣格外壯觀。

sentences.english: Historically, a Carthaginian citizen phalanx was of poor quality.
sentences.chinese: 在歷史上，迦太基公民方陣是低質素的。

sentences.english: Based oh the codes, a fast single byte-error correction scheme for main memory is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 基於最小方陣碼，本文給出一種快速內存糾錯方案。

sentences.english: The other two phalanxes were led by senior generals.
sentences.chinese: 每項一個方陣由一名將軍率領。

sentences.english: For this to make sense, we need A must be a square matrix.
sentences.chinese: 要讓這個有意義，我們要使A是一個方陣。

sentences.english: With the Macedonian cavalry engaged on both flanks, Alexander sends his phalanxes straight into the center of the Persian lines.
sentences.chinese: 亞歷山大派遣方陣，長驅直入波斯軍陣列的中央。

sentences.english: On one land, tens of thousands men ranked and rushed and killed.
sentences.chinese: 在一塊大陸上，上萬的人排成方陣，彼此衝殺。

sentences.english: Sixty cannons and the thirteen squares darted lightning point-blank on the cuirassiers.
sentences.chinese: 六十尊大炮和十三個方陣同時向着鐵騎軍劈面射來。

sentences.english: Naval cadets in President John F. Kennedy's Inauguration Parade. Washington, Dc', US. 1961
sentences.chinese: 海軍士官生方陣在肯尼迪總統就職典禮的閱兵儀式上。

sentences.english: When they do fight, they fight as a militia phalanx.
sentences.chinese: 當他們作戰時他們是用民兵方陣戰鬥。

sentences.english: Then Darius unleashes his chariots on the Macedonian phalanxes in the center.
sentences.chinese: 接着大流士派遣戰車衝向中央的馬其頓方陣。

definition: to get ready (for a journey)/ready and waiting
to be adjusted to uniformity (usually of weights and measures) (idiom)
sporting event/item on program of sports competition
to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
